dict.acceptation: 销售，经销，行销，商品销售业务；市场学；商品自生产者转移到消费者手中的一系列有关机能；〈集合词〉市场购买的货品，适合市场上销售的货品；

sent.orig: Concepts of e-Business, e-Marketing, e-Government, e-Management, e-Home, e-Library, e-learning, etc. are becoming popular through the world.
sent.trans: e-Business、e-Marketing、e-Government、e-Management、e-Home、e-Library、e-Learn-ing等概念正在全世界范围内迅速流行。

sent.orig: Undergraduate: Marketing Principles, Marketing Channels, Marketing Logistics, Forecasting, Logistics Models and Strategic Marketing Planning.
sent.trans: 本科课程：市场原理，营销渠道，行销物流，物流模型，市场战略规划。

sent.orig: Finally, it researches the marketing management and system engineering object marketing of CDTT oversea marketing.
sent.trans: 最后以市场营销理论作为分析的工具，辅助系统工程的研究方法，研究了大唐电信的目标市场。

sent.orig: To interact with central marketing to ensure all local marketing plans aligned to national marketing plan.
sent.trans: 与中央市场部紧密合作保证区域市场计划与全国市场计划相一致。

sent.orig: Manage documentations, archives, marketing brochures and marketing merchandise. Update the marketing merchandise record on monthly base.
sent.trans: 负责管理和寄送文件资料，样本及市场部物品，每月更新市场部物品清单。
